resources.string: "%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services."

"%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."

"%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance."
"%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
"New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly."

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you are adding this email to your Digits account. You agree that this app and%7$sall apps listed in your Digits account%5$s can access this email address and their users can discover you by email address.

By Tapping %1$sSend confirmation code%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send you an SMS to confirm your phone number. On the next screen, you can choose “Resend code” to receive a new SMS or “Call me” to initiate a phone call to confirm your phone number. Message, call & data rates may apply.
By tapping %1$sCall me%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send a voice call to confirm your phone number. Call & data rates may apply.

By tapping %1$sCreate account%1$s above, you agree to the %8$sTerms of Service%5$s, %9$sPrivacy Policy%5$s, and %10$sCookies Use%5$s of %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s, to share your phone number with %4$s and that other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number.
By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, your %7$sDigits phone number and/or email address%5$s will be shared with %4$s and other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you agree to the %8$sTerms of Service%5$s, %9$sPrivacy Policy%5$s and%10$sCookies Use%5$s of %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s, to share your %7$sDigits phone number and/or emailaddress%5$s with %4$s, and other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.

We use Digits by Twitter to find more of your friends who use this app. When you tap OK, we\'ll upload your address book to Digits by Twitter so that we can help you find users of %1$s that you know or help other users of %1$s find you.
